title: Single Image Upload and Catalogue Generation Success
description: Verify that a user can upload a single valid dress image and successfully generate AI model showcases with correct job creation and status updates.

steps.description: Navigate to catalogue generation page
Upload a single valid image file (JPEG format)
Select required model presets and output package
Submit the generation job
Check that system responds with job ID and status 'processing'
Poll job status endpoint until status is 'completed'
Verify generated assets include 3-5 photorealistic stills, 15-second video clip, and 30-second runway video
Verify multi-angle toggles and metadata badges are displayed in output preview

title: Batch Image Upload with Maximum 200 Images
description: Validate batch upload functionality for catalogue generation with maximum 200 images and ensure correct job creation and batch processing.

steps.description: Navigate to catalogue generation page
Batch upload 200 valid image files including supported formats (JPEG, PNG, WEBP, HEIC)
Select presets and output package for batch
Submit the batch generation job
Check that system accepts batch and returns a job ID with status 'processing'
Verify progress monitoring shows incremental progress and estimated time to completion
Wait for job completion status
Verify all generated assets include appropriate stills, videos, and metadata previews per image

title: Invalid File Format Upload Handling
description: Ensure that upload validation rejects unsupported file formats and displays appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to catalogue generation page
Attempt to upload unsupported file formats (e.g., GIF, BMP, TXT)
Verify client-side validation blocks each invalid file with an error message
Submit upload with only invalid files
Check that server responds with 400 Bad Request indicating invalid file format

title: Resumable Upload Support
description: Confirm that interrupted uploads can resume without data loss or corruption.

steps.description: Start uploading a large image or batch upload
Interrupt the network connection or cancel upload mid-way
Resume upload process from interruption point
Verify upload resumes correctly and completes successfully

title: Job Queue Retry and Cancellation
description: Validate ability to retry failed jobs and cancel processing jobs successfully.

steps.description: Submit catalogue generation job with valid inputs
Simulate generation failure or cause a job to fail
Verify job status updates to 'failed'
Use retry option to resubmit the failed job
Check job status updates to 'processing' and eventually to 'completed'
Submit a new catalogue generation job
Cancel the job before completion
Verify job status changes to 'cancelled' and resources are freed

title: Output Preview Metadata Editing
description: Confirm inline editing of metadata badges on generated output previews functions correctly and saves changes.

steps.description: Complete a catalogue generation job and open output preview
Toggle between multiple angles of generated assets
Edit metadata badges (market appeal score, style compatibility, body diversity)
Save edited metadata inline
Verify edited metadata persists and reflects in subsequent views and exports

title: Bulk Export ZIP Contents and Structure
description: Verify bulk export generates ZIP file containing structured folders for images, videos, and metadata in CSV/JSON formats correctly.

steps.description: Complete one or more catalogue generation jobs with multiple assets
Perform bulk export with selected catalogue items
Validate ZIP file downloads successfully
Extract ZIP and confirm folders are correctly named and organized (e.g., images/, videos/)
Verify presence and correctness of metadata files (CSV/JSON) matching exported assets

title: Trend Analyzer Filters and Data Accuracy
description: Confirm that applying filters in Trend Analyzer dashboard returns accurate trend data consistent with external sources.

steps.description: Navigate to Trend Analyzer dashboard
Apply filters for age group, season, category, region, and time range
Verify dashboard updates trending carousel, demographic charts, heatmaps, time-series, and YoY comparisons correctly
Cross-reference displayed trend data with Google Trends and social listening sources for consistency

title: Predictive Insights with Confidence Scores and Actions
description: Verify that machine learning-driven predictive insights display confidence scores and provide recommended actions clearly.

steps.description: Access Trend Analyzer predictive insights section
Check that insights include confidence scores for forecasts
Verify recommendations for actions are relevant and actionable

title: Watchlist Alerts via Email and Slack
description: Test watchlist creation and alert triggering on trend velocity changes with notifications sent via email and Slack.

steps.description: Pin specific trends to user watchlist
Configure alert preferences for email and Slack notifications
Simulate or wait for trend velocity changes triggering alert threshold
Verify user receives alert notifications correctly on email and Slack

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Confirm that role-based access controls restrict unauthorized users from accessing sensitive features and data consistent with GDPR/CCPA compliance.

steps.description: Log in as a user without admin or proper permissions
Attempt to access admin-only APIs, job cancellation, or sensitive trend data
Verify access is denied with appropriate HTTP 403 Forbidden responses
Log in as a user with full permissions
Verify access to all authorized resources and features

title: Secure File Scanning and Audit Logging
description: Validate that all uploaded files undergo malware scanning and that all critical operations are logged for audit purposes.

steps.description: Upload a file known to trigger antivirus scanner (test/malicious pattern file)
Verify upload is blocked and user is notified of security scan failure
Perform catalogue generation and other critical actions
Check audit logs for records of uploads, job submissions, cancellations, and metadata edits with user identifiers and timestamps

title: API Rate Limiting and Caching Behavior
description: Ensure that API endpoints enforce rate limits, return proper headers, and utilize caching for efficient repeated requests.

steps.description: Make multiple rapid consecutive requests to catalogue generation and trend data APIs exceeding allowed rates
Verify 429 Too Many Requests responses are returned appropriately with retry headers
Request repeated trend data endpoint with same filters
Verify responses are served quickly from cache with matching cached data headers

title: Handling Upload Failures and Generation Timeouts
description: Test that the system gracefully handles upload failures, generation timeouts, and missing data with user-facing notifications and fallback options.

steps.description: Simulate network failure during image upload
Verify user receives notification of upload failure and options to retry or cancel
Simulate AI generation process hitting timeouts or server errors
Verify job status updates to 'failed' and user is informed with retry options
Request trend data for a non-existent or empty filter set resulting in no data
Verify dashboard displays appropriate 'no data' message and fallback visualizations

title: Catalogue Generation API - Health and Invalid Calls
description: Verify Catalogue Generator API /generate, /status, and /download endpoints respond correctly for valid and invalid calls including error conditions.

steps.description: Call /api/catalogue/generate with valid multipart/form-data images
Verify 202 Accepted response with jobId and estimatedTime
Call /api/catalogue/generate with missing images or invalid payload
Verify 400 Bad Request response
Call /api/catalogue/status/{jobId} with valid and invalid jobId
Verify 200 OK with job status for valid jobId, and 404 Not Found for invalid
Call /api/catalogue/download/{itemId} with valid and invalid itemId
Verify 200 OK with file stream for valid itemId, and 404 Not Found for invalid

title: Trend Analyzer API - Filter Validation and Data Responses
description: Ensure Trend Analyzer API returns expected data or errors for valid and invalid filter parameters.

steps.description: Make GET requests to /api/trends with valid filters (ageGroup, season, category, timeRange)
Verify 200 OK with trend data matching requested filters
Make GET requests to /api/trends with invalid or unsupported filter values
Verify 400 Bad Request with error messages indicating invalid filters
Request /api/trends/categories/list
Verify 200 OK with list of categories available

title: API Health Check Endpoint Verification
description: Verify the health check API endpoint responds correctly with current system status, timestamp, and uptime.

steps.description: Make GET request to /api/health
Verify 200 OK response with JSON containing 'status' as 'ok', valid ISO8601 timestamp, and numeric uptime
